Title: Instructions to Request a Grade Report
Body: Date: Tue, 14 Jan 1997 23:00:01 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5 Content-type: text/html Instructions to Request a Grade Report Boston University / CLA Computer Science Dept CLA CS-101 (B1): Introduction to Computers Instructions to Request a Grade Report You could request a report of your grade in cs101b1 by sending an empty Email message to Prof. Azer Bestavros with the "Subject:" line containing the sentence getgrade cs101b1 as shown below.
